entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
